codeanticode.syphon
Class SyphonClient

java.lang.Object
  codeanticode.syphon.SyphonClient

public class SyphonClient
extends java.lang.Object

Syphon client class. It receives textures from a Syphon server.

Constructor Summary

getGraphics

public processing.core.PGraphics getGraphics(processing.core.PGraphics dest)
Copies the new frame to a PGraphics object. It initializes dest if it is null or has the wrong size. It uses FBOs for fast copy.

Parameters:
dest -

getImage

public processing.core.PImage getImage(processing.core.PImage dest)
Copies the new frame to a PImage object. It initializes dest if it is null or has the wrong size. It is relatively slow because it copies the content of the texture frame to the pixels array of the image.

Parameters:
dest -

stop

public void stop()
Stops the client.
